attributes.action: Bring in new legislation to protect the elderly to the same level as child protection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New legislation is urgently needed to protect the elderly and vulnerable adults at the same level as given to child protection. Ensuring that all abuse including financial abuse of the elderly is dealt with seriously as defined by the POVA act "NO SECRETS", and prosecutions are brought against those that commit these unacceptable acts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
